subject: Order delivery
description_text: Hello, I have a question about my order, Orders Order #SSN4390 Any idea when it will be shipped? And a second question regarding the haptic mounting, I saw on facebook that you added a new horizontal mount for them, will they be automatically added to my order or I need to order them separately? Thank you. Order orderOrder #SSN4390

conversations.body_text: Hi Ghitulescu. andrei,    Your order includes this new U-shaped bracket. We have already shipped part of your order, and the remainder will be dispatched next week once it arrives at our German warehouse.

That's great, thank you very much.

On Fri, 12 Dec 2025 at 14:04, service@simsonn.com

Hello, any updates on the order? I haven’t received anything yet.
I’m also wondering about order
#SSN4355 which has the pre order of the new shifter, will it be shipped
soon?
Thank you.

On Fri, 12 Dec 2025 at 14:04, service@simsonn.com
Hi Ghitulescu. andrei,    Yes, the new shifter orders will be dispatched throughout this week.
